alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 1:12AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jo Daviess, southeastern Buchanan, northwestern Jackson, northwestern Cedar, Dubuque, southeastern Benton, northwestern Jones, Delaware, Linn and northwestern Iowa Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 111 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Holy Cross to near Norway. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 13 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
